# Government Tender Announcement
## Non-Tax Program Envelopes for Canada Revenue Agency (CRA)

### Tender Details
| Title | Reference | Closing Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Request for Proposal for Non-Tax Program Envelopes | PW-22-01004293 | 2022-09-07 14:00:00 |

### Description
The Agency requires the supply and packaging of Government of Canada envelopes to be delivered to employees across Canada on an as-and-when-requested basis. The successful bidder will be responsible for shipping the envelopes to the relevant addresses.

### Evaluation Criteria
To be considered for the contract, the bidder must demonstrate their ability to meet the Agency's requirements, and their bid must be compliant with the procurement documents. The bidder must also provide evidence of a commitment to become a registered supplier with the Ariba Supplier Network (ASN) before contract award.

### Extension Option
The contract will be awarded for a period of 2 years with an irrevocable option to extend the contract for three additional one-year periods.

### Notice Type and Publication
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Publication Date: August 15, 2022
* Amendment Date: September 1, 2022

### Trade Agreements and Security
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Security Requirements: None

### Contact Information
* Michael Yaehne
* michael.yaehne@cra-arc.gc.ca
* 613-995-4627

### Important Notes
* Bids must be submitted using Connect provided by Canada Post Corporation.
* The Agency reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Conditional Set-Aside: This procurement may be conditionally set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. Bidders must meet the eligibility criteria set out in the Set-Aside Program to be considered for this market.

### Consult Documents
See the attached documents and contract documents for additional information and requirements.
